DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine safety tolerability AZD1446 v Placebo give add-on treatment Donepezil 4 week patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: 4 Week , Safety Tolerability Study Patients With Mild Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: history progressive worsen memory cognitive function least 12 month treatment stable dose donepezil ( 10 mg ) least 3 month patient appropriate caregiver , require study visit history allergy/hypersensitivity reaction significant neurological disease dementia Alzheimer 's disease myocardial infarction acute coronary syndrome within last year
DOC.keyword: To determine safety tolerability AZD1446 v Placebo give add-on treatment Donepezil patient mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease
